job_to_be_done.task: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Nuts

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Ingredients:
1 eggplant, diced •
1 zucchini, diced •
1 bell pepper, diced •
1 small onion, diced •
2 cloves garlic, minced •
4 tomatoes, diced •

Ingredients : •
4 tomatoes o
1 small onion o
1 cucumber o
1/4 cup cilantro o
1/4 cup lemon juice o
1 teaspoon salt o
Instructions : •
Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber. o
Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt. o
Serve chilled. o
Käsespätzle (Cheese Noodles)
Ingredients : •
2 cups flour o
1/2 cup milk o
3 eggs o
1 teaspoon salt o
1/4 teaspoon nutmeg o
1/4 cup butter o
1 cup grated cheese o
1 small onion o
Instructions : •
Mix flour, milk, beaten eggs, salt, and nutmeg to form a batter. o
Press batter through a spaetzle maker or colander into boiling water. o
Cook until spaetzle floats to the surface, then drain. o
Sauté sliced onion in butter until golden. o
Layer spaetzle and grated cheese in a baking dish, top with sautéed onion. o
Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 15 minutes until cheese is melted. o
Serve warm. o
Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad)
Ingredients : •
4 potatoes o
1 small onion o
1/4 cup bacon o
1/4 cup vinegar o
1/4 cup chicken broth o
1 tablespoon mustard o
1 teaspoon sugar o
1 teaspoon salt o
1/2 teaspoon pepper o
Instructions : •
Boil potatoes until tender, then dice. o
Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside. o
Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened. o
Mix vinegar, chicken broth, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper in a bowl. o
Combine potatoes, bacon, and onion with the dressing. o
Serve warm or chilled. o
Keftedes
Ingredients : •
1/2 pound ground beef o
1/2 pound ground pork o
1 small onion o
2 cloves garlic o
1/4 cup bread

Ingredients:
1 cup Greek yogurt •
1 tablespoon honey •
1/4 cup mixed nuts •
Instructions:
In a bowl, combine Greek yogurt and honey. •
Top with mixed nuts. •
Serve immediately. •
Avocado and Egg Toast
Ingredients:
2 slices whole grain bread, toasted •
1 ripe avocado •
1 large egg, poached or fried •
Crushed red pepper flakes to taste •
Salt and pepper to taste •
Instructions:
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread. •
Top with the poached or fried egg. •
Season with crushed red pepper flakes + salt and pepper. •
Serve immediately. •

Ingredients:
1 large whole wheat tortilla •
1/4 cup hummus •
1/4 cup shredded carrots •
1/4 cup sliced cucumber •
1/4 cup baby spinach •
1/4 cup sliced bell pepper •
Instructions:
Spread hummus on the tortilla. •
Layer with shredded carrots, cucumber, spinach, and bell pepper. •
Roll up the tortilla tightly. •
Slice in half and serve. •
Almond Butter Banana Toast
Ingredients:
2 slices whole grain bread, toasted •
2 tablespoons almond butter •
1 banana, sliced •
1 teaspoon chia seeds •
Instructions:
Spread almond butter on the toasted bread. •
Top with banana slices and sprinkle with chia seeds. •
Serve immediately. •

Ingredients:
4 boneless, skinless chicken thighs •
1 cup yogurt •
2 tablespoons lemon juice •
2 cloves garlic, minced •
1 teaspoon grated ginger •
1 teaspoon cumin •
1 teaspoon coriander •
1 teaspoon turmeric •
1 teaspoon paprika •
1 teaspoon garam masala •
1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper •
Salt and pepper to taste •
Instructions:
In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, minced garlic, grated ginger, cumin, coriander, •
turmeric, paprika, garam masala, cayenne pepper, salt, and pepper.
Marinate chicken thighs in the mixture for at least 1 hour. •
Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). •
Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes until cooked through. •
Serve warm. •
